channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- RapidExpCart
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- RapidExpCart

item.title: CVE-2023-0520|2024-08-02T05:17:49.376Z -- unknown -- rapidexpcart
item.description: The RapidExpCart WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not sanitize and escape the url parameter in the rapidexpcart endpoint before storing it and outputting it back in the page, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability which could be used against high-privilege users such as admin, furthermore lack of csrf protection means an attacker can trick a logged in admin to perform the attack by submitting a hidden form.
